name: Monkey Miners
description:
Mine for gold in Monkey See, Monkey Doo, then spend it on powerups during Simian Shakedown!

Up to 4 players can play with DualShock4 controllers!

Art - Jason Schloss

Programming, Design - Sean Brady

Programming, Design - Eric Guadara

Known Bugs:

UI - If playing in the web build (and maybe also with the Windows build), the UI will draw over itself. No clue why it's doing that. The Mac version seems to work just fine!
